To work properly, HelpWave needs access to:

- Microphone and Camera (for video calls)

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description:
By using this application, you agree to participate in a community based on respect, collaboration, and mutual assistance.

You commit to providing and receiving help in good faith, respecting the privacy of other users, and using this platform solely for permitted purposes.

HelpWave is not responsible for the content of interactions but reserves the right to suspend accounts in case of misuse.
